Generative AI.why: Empowers Jerenyon to build AI-driven tools using LLMs, RAG, and automation for intelligent, scalable solutions.

FastAPI.why: Allows Jerenyon to develop fast, efficient APIs for AI applications and scalable cloud services.

GIS.why: Enables Jerenyon to integrate geoprocessing and spatial intelligence into AI-driven automation and analytics.

Automation.why: Allows Jerenyon to eliminate manual bottlenecks, optimize development workflows, and focus on high-value innovation.
